aroma.notes: Vanilla, spice, warm cider, with a loud fruit punchy note. I don't think there's any bitterness, but I was surprised how strong the fruit note was, which could be the 'tang'.

acidity.notes: Deep fruit punch note â€” sugary and tart.

sweetness.notes: Some mouthfilling complexity, fruit notes are well-balanced.

body.notes: Syrupy. Could tell when pouring coffee into cup that it wasn't thick, but also not watery.

finish.notes: Minty finish immediately after swallow. Tongue feels fresh long after. A little astringency halfway through cup. Slight aftertaste like after green tea.

flavor: Fruit punch/tropical note is the focal point of this cup. Moderate complexity with that characteristic cream note. Finish is minty but just slightly astringent. Cup becomes increasingly juicy as it cools.
observations: 8 second swirl bloom with 70g (didn't quite feel like enough). Max 2 second Rao spin with tap. Last third of drawdown was a little faster than last time.
actionItem: Research how to shave off 10 seconds with technique. This is so close.
